description: Gilded Lily (Lillian von Loont) is a fictional supervillain featured in the Marvel Comics series Alpha Flight.Disambiguate: silent film of 1921 starring Mae Murray; "1935 film starring Claudette Colbert" ; also, a Shakespearean phrase, from "To gild refined gold, to paint the lily/To throw perfume on a violet" (Salisbury: Act 4, Scene 2 of "King John").
name: Gilded Lily
powers: Wide array of alchemical weaponry. Immortality.
